mission-sheet.name: SAFETY - Lift evacuation on urban blocks

italic.text: Emergency evacuation: removal of persons from a dangerous place due to a disaster or impending war.

line.text: In SWORD, a population is evacuated from the urban block it populates. This mission is the reverse of the "Lift evacuation from urban blocks within area" mission. Its goal is to lift an evacuation on a set of urban blocks within a specified zone.
Lines used by units to adapt their behavior when they reach or cross them.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.
An ordered list of populated areas in which a population can be confined.
The agent moves toward each provided urban block. The agent stops at the border of the urban block.
Upon reaching a urban block, the agent lifts evacuation on it before moving to the next unvisited urban block.
When all the urban blocks have been visited, the unit goes to the rally point.
The evacuation status may not be lifted if the urban block cannot be populated (the report "urban block cannot be inhabited" is displayed) . In this case, the agent decides to act on the block.
When the rally point is reached, the mission ends.
